events.title: REAPER Made Easy's January Q&A
events.description: Scott and JennyK will be online for a couple of hours answering questions about REAPER and OSARA. As always it will be a loose hang where we all learn together, mildly chaotic, hopefully helpful, and if nothing else, it's often entertaining.

events.title: REAPER Made Easy's end of year wrap up
events.description: No Q&A this time, instead we'll be playing a bunch of productions people in the community have done with REAPER and OSARA throughout the year. If the last time we did this is anything to go by, expect a sumptuous buffet for the ears.
